query:
SELECT playerName, COUNT(*) as upgradeCount, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT upgradeType) as types 
FROM upgrade_log 
WHERE playerName IN ('De''Aaron Fox', 'Egor Demin', 'Kristaps Porzingis', 'Berringer') 
GROUP BY playerName 
ORDER BY playerName
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user waCuRew5RKYFFjj.root --database DS68jwRuNTWiz9tNrw6KXW --execute SELECT playerName, COUNT(*) as upgradeCount, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT upgradeType) as types 
FROM upgrade_log 
WHERE playerName IN ('De''Aaron Fox', 'Egor Demin', 'Kristaps Porzingis', 'Berringer') 
GROUP BY playerName 
ORDER BY playerName
